name: Thermonuclear Domination
description:
Thermonuclear Domination is a small and simple turn-based game for Windows, for 1 to 4 players.

Players take turns in aiming and firing nuclear weapons using a simple angle/range system. Each side has missile silos, cities, factories and submarines to control. One hidden city houses the enemy headquarters, destroy this and the enemy will lose.

Thermonuclear Domination is simple and fun to play, and you get to destroy the world too.

It was developed and released in 1998 and only uses the Windows API so should work on every version of Windows (even Windows 95). Includes a modern fancy pdf manual.

A few years later I made a swanky modern 3D version of this game called Radioactive. Happy apocalypsing.
